text: Stockport Carriage Sidings are located in Stockport, Greater Manchester, England, to the west of West Coast Main Line adjacent to Stockport railway station. == Present == Stabling is provided for Class 150 and Class 156 Sprinters and Class 323 EMUs. ==References== ===Sources=== * Category:Railway sidings in England Category:Rail transport in Greater Manchester
title: Stockport Carriage Sidings
